auth.registerMyCompany: I want to register my company
auth.recontactDesc: Are you a company? Send us your email, we will get back to you shortly to help you create your Corppooling account.

header.whereDoYouGo: Where do you want to go?

home.description: The carpooling app dedicated to businesses

tutorial.searchPassenger: Share where you want to go. Maybe someone else wants to go there too!
tutorial.searchDriver: Register your trip on the app to let your colleagues travel with you.
tutorial.talkPassenger: Talk to the driver to agree on a price and meeting point that suits you.
tutorial.talkDriver: Talk to the passenger to agree on the price and meeting point.
tutorial.carPassenger: On the road! You can now enjoy your trip.
tutorial.carDriver: Great! You're traveling at a lower cost and can make new connections.
